characters.name: Spider-Man
characters.description: Peter Parker was bitten by a radioactive spider and gained superhuman abilities.

characters.name: Iron Man
characters.description: Tony Stark is a billionaire genius who built a high-tech suit to fight crime.

characters.name: Wolverine
characters.description: Logan has adamantium claws and a healing factor that makes him almost immortal.

characters.name: Magneto
characters.description: Erik Lehnsherr can manipulate magnetic fields and is often an enemy of the X-Men.

characters.name: Batman
characters.description: Bruce Wayne is a vigilante in Gotham who fights crime using his intellect and physical skills.

characters.name: Superman
characters.description: Kal-El is an alien from Krypton with superhuman strength, flight, and X-ray vision.

characters.name: Joker
characters.description: The Clown Prince of Crime is a psychopathic master of chaos and Batman's enemy.

characters.name: Hellboy
characters.description: Hellboy is a demon raised by humans who fights supernatural creatures to protect Earth.

characters.name: Grendel
characters.description: A villain with superhuman abilities and dangerous intellect, recurring enemy of Hellboy and other heroes.

characters.name: Thor
characters.description: Thor is the God of Thunder who protects both Asgard and Earth.

characters.name: Thanos
characters.description: Thanos seeks to gather the Infinity Stones to impose his vision of order on the universe.
